llm_res.rule: When minting/creating tokens, the `_from` argument MUST be set to `0x0` (i.e. zero address).
Transfers of 0 values must be treated as normal transfers and fire the `Transfer` event.
llm_res.function: function transferFrom(address sender, address recipient, uint256 amount) public virtual override returns (bool)

llm_res.rule: totalSupply should return the actual total supply without any modifications or additions.
